page.title: 13OTHER LOCAL NEWS ITEMS
page.content: Open House (1985) St. Peter's Church Ladies Group who are very dedicated and support church activities, such as plans for future development, held a meeting on the 13th May at the Church Centre. The speaker was the Rev. Allan Crossley, Chaplain to Furness General Hospital. ***** Women's Intitute (1985) The Ireleth W.I. president, Mrs A. Major, welcomed members and friends to the monthly meeting on April 1st. After the usual preliminary business items had been dealt with members from the Newton W.I. joined in for a social evening and buffet supper. A number of enjoyable quiz games were arranged by Mrs Kendal. Mrs Clark won the raffle and Mrs Gilcrist won the flowers. A vote of thanks was given by Mrs Clark.
